summary: 查询工作空间下特定应用模板详情。

items.description: 应用的输出参数表达式

400.errorMessage: The input parameter %s that is mandatory for processing this request is not supplied.

404.errorMessage: The specified user is not found.

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "TemplateName": "test-template",

title: 查询应用模板详情
